title: Pet Friendly Community! Call For Move In Specials Today!
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Located in the heart of Pleasant Hill, Ellinwood is a pet friendly community made up of one-bedroom apartment homes in a condominium-quality complex and serene park-like setting.

Our newly renovated community features a sparkling swimming pool and spa, BBQ area, fire pit with lounge seating, clubhouse, professional on-site management, laundry facilities and abundant mature landscaping throughout.
We’re conveniently situated adjacent to numerous shopping destinations including nearby Crescent Plaza, Sunvalley Shopping Center and Ellinwood Square located immediately next door.
Downtown Walnut Creek is also just a short drive away from the property as is the Pleasant Hill BART Station.
Visit us today at <URL> for more info.
We ask that you bring no more than 2 furry friends with you.
Ask us today how you can get 1 MONTH FREE!
Shared pool, Clubhouse, Barbecue, Fire Pit
Park, Court Yard View*, Pool View*, Creek View*
Hardwood floor, Hot tub / Spa, Non-Smoking Property, Spacious Closets
